quotes: If you drop a mic, be sure you can afford the fee.
Although I walk in the shadow of the valley of death, I have a flashlight.
He who fights with monsters should look to it that he himself does not become a monster. And when you gaze long into an abyss the abyss also gazes into you.
I'm not a wizard who can come up with quirky bullshit at the drop of a hat.
The master has failed more times than the beginner has even tried. The intern has probably failed more than that in just the last two lines of code.
On a journey to the center of three.
A plethora of maniacs and spiral stairs.
I know the first three numbers.
I know the first three numbers.
You'll catch a jpeg to the head.
You'll catch a jpeg to the head.
Come and knock on the door. We've been waiting for you.
Space elevators will change the world, but the real money is going to be made by the people composing the elevator music.
meta: Quotes are taken from some songs (notably "Hacker" by Death Grips) or the public conciousness. Some are original.
